name: Azoth's Cave
description:
Azoth's Cave is a text-based RPG developed using Unity. 

It was made as a little project to improve my understanding of the Unity game engine. The project is incomplete, and I unfortunately do not have plans to update the game in the near future. 

To start the game, first you need make an adventurer. Choose a name and then choose between 6 different classes and backgrounds, which will give you stats and equipment based on what you chose

I was a little hasty in uploading the game, so beware of bugs (and typos)! Feel free to leave comments on the game's page. I might not be working on the game currently, but I would appreciate any advice or notes on how to improve it.  

Pro tip: You can click anywhere on the game screen after inputting a number. This will let the game register your input as if you had pressed the Enter button.

Credits

  • Kirsty font by Typodermic Fonts.
  • Azoth's Cave made in Unity
